description: "Map of the Dutch East Indies featuring maritime routes from the Sunda Strait and Batavia (Jakarta) to the Maluku or Spice Islands (Ambon, Ternate etc.). There is an eastern route (taken from October to March) and a return route (December to March)."
title: "Carte des possessions et etablissemens du Roi des Pays-Bas aux Indes Orientales"
